concept.title: Freshly-Squeezed Orange Juice
concept.shortdesc: Orange juice is the perfect way to start your day, it's both refreshing and healthy.

conbody.p: Typically, we buy our orange pre-squeezed from the store. However, it is healthier and more tasty to squeeze your juice on your own. This way, you know its fresh and let's not ignore the obvious fact that using a juicer is fun!
With that extra kick of champagne, this yummy treat will defintely brighten your day!
The blend of healthy and deliciousness in this drink is certain to put a pep in your step!
